article: In Australia, different people have different ways to enjoy themselves. They also have their own ideas about  _  to pass time.  _  children, about 80%, work hard in school because they have to take lots of exams. After school, they don't want to stay at home reading books any more.  _  , they put aside their school bags and go out to play. Some old people  get up  early in the morning. Then they go to park to  read newspapers  . It helps them know what is happening around the world. In the evening, they would prefer to stay at home  watching TV  rather than do anything else. Young people enjoy having  _  trip on weekends. They go to mountains to have a picnic or go to the  _  to camp. They usually start on Friday and spend one or two days outside. Then on  _  evening, they start their way back home.  _  seems to be in a hurry, although a busy week is waiting for them again.
